name: Optum
description: Optum is a leading health solution and care delivery organization. Our work is complex, but our mission is simple: create a healthier world, with you at the center. At Optum, we bring together advanced data and technology, deep clinical experience and professional partnerships — making health care smarter and simpler for you. Optum, part of the UnitedHealth Group family of businesses, is powering modern health care by connecting and serving the whole health system across 150 countries. We combine cutting-edge technology, the world’s largest health care database and vast expertise to improve health care delivery, quality and efficiency. We are revolutionizing health care that serves more than 100,000 physicians, practices and other health care facilities, as well as 127 million individual consumers
Headline: Looking ahead to a healthy new year
ShortDescription: Optum is a health services and innovation company on a mission to help people live healthier lives and to help make the health system work better for everyone.
enhanced_description: Optum, a part of the UnitedHealth Group family of businesses, is a leading health solution and care delivery organization dedicated to creating a healthier world. It leverages advanced data, cutting-edge technology, and extensive clinical experience, including the world’s largest healthcare database, to simplify and improve healthcare delivery, quality, and efficiency. For HR, Optum's offerings fall under Total Rewards, focusing on improving employee happiness and engagement. This includes comprehensive well-being programs and services, financial fitness benefits, and support for competitive compensation opportunities. Functioning as corporate wellness software, a health & safety provider, and benefits administration software, Optum serves a vast ecosystem of healthcare providers and individual consumers across 150 countries, impacting over 100,000 physicians, practices, and facilities, and 127 million individual consumers.
